about.description:
This is a Python package for performing representational similarity
analysis (RSA) using MNE-Python data structures. The RSA is computed using
a “searchlight” approach.
about.summary: Representational Similarity Analysis on MEG and EEG data

about.description:
This is a Python package for performing representational similarity
analysis (RSA) using MNE-Python data structures. The RSA is computed using
a “searchlight” approach.
about.summary: Representational Similarity Analysis on MEG and EEG data

name: mne-rsa

new_version_errors.0.7:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.7' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mne-rsa" %}
{% set version = "0.6" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fbc6d2f4f34593384f4b45c3a172f4b694e25dc41e4dc023c26cdd018cab75ef

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - matplotlib-base
    - mne-base
    - nibabel
    - scikit-learn

test:
  imports:
    - mne_rsa
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://users.aalto.fi/~vanvlm1/mne-rsa/
  license: BSD-3-Clause 
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Representational Similarity Analysis on MEG and EEG data
  description: |
    This is a Python package for performing representational similarity
    analysis (RSA) using MNE-Python data structures. The RSA is computed using
    a “searchlight” approach.
  dev_url: https://github.com/wmvanvliet/mne-rsa

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hoechenberger
    - larsoner
    - wmvanvliet
